title: Apsara Kundan Haaram with Regal Sapphire Drop
features: Intricately handcrafted Kundan setting with traditional peacock motifs (Mayura designs). Features a graduating design that cascades gracefully around the neck. The pendant showcases a larger sapphire in a regal setting, surrounded by smaller kundan stones. The gold balls (gundlu) dangle from the bottom, adding movement and charm. The back showcases elaborate filigree details.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for upscale evening events.
description: A timeless classic with exceptional craftsmanship. This haaram embodies traditional South Indian elegance with a modern touch. The high-quality Kundan stones sparkle brilliantly, enhancing the sapphire's captivating deep blue hue. The rich Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability, making it a valuable heirloom for generations.
